discussion.content:
From the Table extensions and classes in Servicenow Product documentation 
"A table that extends another table is called a child class, and the table it extends is the parent class. A table can be both a parent and child class both extending and providing extensions for other tables. A parent class that is not an extension of another table is called a base class."

choices.D: Base Class table is not extended from another table, Parent class tables may be extended from another table.
choices.C: Base Class tables always have tables extended from them. Parent tables do not have tables extended from them.
choices.A: Extended tables are always extended from Parent tables. Extended tables are usually extended from Base tables.
choices.B: Extended tables can be extended from Parent tables or Base tables; but they cannot be extended from both.
